subject: Re: FW: [Stylist] Payment Proposal - 34 Manor Drive, Frankston South VIC 3199 - ACCEPTED
preview: Hi Ben,  Sure, when the client submits the proposal, it's possible that a stylist may have been editing it at the same time and then resaved it.

full_threads.body:
Hi Ben,

Sure, when the client submits the proposal, it's possible that a stylist may have been editing it at the same time and then resaved it.

Thanks do we know what the issue was?

Kind Regards,

Ben Rookes
OPERATIONS MANAGER

0456 553 848 | brookes@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Ben,

Confirming we have updated the proposal.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

Hi Joel,


See below, email says its accepted but proposal platform is still saying pending??




Regards,


Ben Rookes

To: Ben Rookes <brookes@novaricollective.com>; Mikaela Camilleri <mcamilleri@novaricollective.com>; Rachel Patane <rpatane@novaricollective.com>
Subject: FW: [Stylist] Payment Proposal - 34 Manor Drive, Frankston South VIC 3199 - ACCEPTED


Woop Woop!!! I got my first job!!


@Rachel Patane: thanks for letting me be under 3.800 and I just saw that they also took the risk protection off, so need to discuss if the min spent needs to include this for future once and will from now on communicate it from he start with clients 😉


@Mikaela Camilleri: wrong date 😃 the 9th is a public holiday, just changed it in the quote it will be on the 10th of June (if possible, in the morning?)

  • Also will finish now the brief and booking form



Warm regards,


Jana Cameron
